note: As far the interim management committee list is concerned who are accountable for the management and handling of the society, the society must minimum 7 members and this list can go upto 21 members. After the 97th Constitutional Modification Act 2011 from February 2013, it is compulsory to keep 2 women and 1 additional member who belongs to Scheduled Caste or to Scheduled People in the main governing body list.
